Description: The name of the arm or factor (can include a specific intervention, a placebo or even a lack of intervention, ie- 'no intervention' group)
The role of the arm or factor in the study this is equivalent to the ArmType in ClinicalTrials.gov
allowed values: "experimental arm", "active comparator arm", "placebo comparator arm", "sham comparator arm", and "no intervention arm"

Description: The category of the arm or factor in the study
A description of the arm or factor
